question: INDRA 2019 is a joint tri-service exercise of India with which country?
explanation: The joint tri-service exercise between India and Russia named INDRA 2019 will be conducted from December 10-19, 2019. India will for the first time host a joint tri-service military exercise with Russia. ‘Indra-2019’ is expected to enhance inter-operability between both national armed forces to jointly undertake operations under the UN flag. Mechanized contingents, fighter and transport aircraft as well as ships of respective Armies, Air Forces and Navies will participate in this 10-days exercise.
